org.araneaframework.http
Interface FileUploadInputExtension

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
StandardFileUploadInputExtension
public interface FileUploadInputExtension
extends Serializable

Extension to OutputData that allows access the uploaded files.

Author:
Jevgeni Kabanov (ekabanov@araneaframework.org)

Method Summary
 FileItem getUploadedFile(String fieldName)
           
 Map<String,? extends FileItem> getUploadedFiles()
           
 Exception getUploadException()
          Returns the exception that occurred when trying to parse file upload.
 boolean uploadSucceeded()
          Returns whether file upload succeeded, this should only be true when getUploadException() is null.

uploadSucceeded

boolean uploadSucceeded()
Returns whether file upload succeeded, this should only be true when getUploadException() is null.
